comments:
I20031202

Test Case:
Run > Run...
Select a Java Application launch configuration
Go to the classpath tab
Select an entry (User Entries)
Click the Advanced... button
Click Add Container
Select "Required Plugins"
Click OK

Fixed.  No more NPEs.
However, in this case, when you select the 'Required Plugins' container and 
press OK, the classpath tab does not pass in the name of the Java project to 
the container initializer.  Therefore, PDE cannot determine the list of plugin 
libraries/projects because these entries are specific and vary per Java 
project.  Therefore, we return an empty array in this case.
